column4: i'd like to create a website. What programs are there for beginners?
Visual is best!!! With maybe a code option, too. But visual is what I primarily want, I think.
there are limited options for visual-ish editors in linux
so it's a matter of typing html/code?
have you considered just using open office and saving in .html?
works just fine for basic pages
plenty on the net to read about that
ajax for a simple home / subfolder / 3rdDown thingy on every page?
you'd have to be more descriptive as to what you are looking for
those folder listings are usually generated on the fly just so you know

this is what i mean. pls check out http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=414194. See the top part:  Ubuntu Forums > The Ubuntu Forum Community  > Absolute Beginner Talk . that's what i want on every page.
ok. let me rephrase the question...  what's not the furthest from the worst? 8-)
is "dankee" english? what does dankee mean?
